Property.name: altFormats
Property.comment: Multiple date formats separated by '|' to try when parsing a user input value and it doesn't match the defined format (defaults to 'm/d/Y|n/j/Y|n/j/y|m/j/y|n/d/y|m/j/Y|n/d/Y|m-d-y|m-d-Y|m/d|m-d|md|mdy|mdY|d|Y-m-d').

Property.name: autoCreate
Property.comment: A DomHelper element spec, or true for a default element spec (defaults to {tag: 'input', type: 'text', size: '10', autocomplete: 'off'})

Property.name: disabledDates
Property.comment: An array of 'dates' to disable, as strings. These strings will be used to build a dynamic regular expression so they are very powerful.

Property.name: disabledDatesText
Property.comment: The tooltip text to display when the date falls on a disabled date (defaults to 'Disabled')

Property.name: disabledDays
Property.comment: An array of days to disable, 0 based. For example, [0, 6] disables Sunday and Saturday (defaults to null).

Property.name: disabledDaysText
Property.comment: The tooltip to display when the date falls on a disabled day (defaults to 'Disabled')

Property.name: format
Property.comment: The default date format string which can be overriden for localization support. The format must be valid according to {@link Date#parseDate} (defaults to 'm/d/Y').

Property.name: invalidText
Property.comment: The error text to display when the date in the field is invalid (defaults to '{value} is not a valid date - it must be in the format {format}').

Property.name: maxText
Property.comment: The error text to display when the date in the cell is after maxValue (defaults to 'The date in this field must be before {maxValue}').

Property.name: maxValue
Property.comment: The maximum allowed date. Can be either a Javascript date object or a string date in a valid format (defaults to null).

Property.name: minText
Property.comment: The error text to display when the date in the cell is before minValue (defaults to 'The date in this field must be after {minValue}').

Property.name: minValue
Property.comment: The minimum allowed date. Can be either a Javascript date object or a string date in a valid format (defaults to null).

Property.name: showToday
Property.comment: False to hide the footer area of the DatePicker containing the Today button and disable the keyboard handler for spacebar that selects the current date (defaults to true).

Property.name: triggerClass
Property.comment: An additional CSS class used to style the trigger button.
